name: GML Snake (Source Project Included)
description:
Really very simple snake that I made in an hour in Game Maker Studio 2 using the new features that were added since the last time I used it (structs, functions and other basic language features that GML didn't come with). Probably still a lot of bugs I don't know about.

Still on my list todo:

  • Game over screen
  • Simple UI
  • Different game speeds to add difficulty
  • Maybe make it look nicer or something
  • Smooth snake movement
  • And most importantly clean the code
